name: MacVG
description: MacVG is the best game site built for your entertainment with more than 400 diverse games that you can choose from. With a crazy amount of features and content, MacVG makes it easy to browse, play, and enjoy different games! Thanks to 3kh0 for providing some of the games' code!

content.description: Here are the logs for MacVG updates before version 1.0 official release in October. Since this was before release, all the updates aren't very detailed so just note that. Here are the prerelease update logs:

paragraphs.title: v0.13 | 7/21/23
paragraphs.content: Added the About section on the More page, updated the Settings section on the More page,overall performance improvements, and fixed some issues and bugs.

others: Renamed the website to TonyMac129.

content.description: WOAH!!! FINALLY! Ladies and gentlemen, we are introducing: MacVG Stable Version 1.0! The first official stable version of MacVG! This is a HUGE update on everything MacVG! From the name of the website, to newly optimized games, we really changed and refreshed the game site in this remarkable update milestone! Thanks to all you, we are able to continue publish new feautres, changes, and more to MacVG in the past months and we are now ready for version 1.0. EVERYONE, HERE IT IS!

paragraphs.title: WEBSITE REBRANDING
paragraphs.content: This is definitely the biggest update item in MacVG ever! We renamed the unblocked game site to MacVG, where the VG stands for video games, and the Mac is the prefix for every app from MacVG's parent company, MacWeb. Because of the founding of MacWeb, we refreshed every single app with new looks, new names, with brand new features and content! Other than the new name, we also applied new appearance, organizations, and changes to unify with other MacWeb apps!

paragraphs.title: NEWLY OPTIMIZED GAMES
paragraphs.content: Newly optimized games with fixed content, title, appearance, and performance so you can enjoy and play them on MacVG more smoothly than ever without lagging or any issues üòé!

paragraphs.title: NEW CLOAKER
paragraphs.content: Other than just renaming the title of the page in the browser, the Cloaker can also change the logo, and even change the page title to your desired cloaking website ‚öôÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW WEBSITE APPEARANCE
paragraphs.content: New and more modern navigation bar and games interactive experience üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW PAGE: Updates!
paragraphs.content: Added Updates page for more detailed update release notes for updates after the version 1.0 launch üìï!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURES COMING SOON
paragraphs.content: Favorites and Download are releasing in November! You will be able to favorite games and access them quicker and download games for offline use! Other than those two, we still have A LOT features to release, so be hold üò≤!

others: Briefly removed MacVG from GitHub for HUGE maintainance and organization purposes.
Improved UI and UX: More functionality and better visuals.
Fixed a lot of games that weren't working or crashing.
Fixed many games lagging and glitching issues.
Fixed game thumbnails/links not working.
New page navigations and content on each page.
Removed 25 games for maintainance and optimization.

content.description: Well, to be honest, we didn't put that much effort into this update since we're focusing on the overall MacWeb app tree and file organization stuff. During this update, there were quite a few changes to MacWeb and it was chaotic. So here they are, our first steps toward the best, the most feature-packed, and the most modern game site out there!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Random Game Selector!
paragraphs.content: There's a new button next to the search bar on the home page that selects a random game for more convenient and easier game browsing üé≤!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Tool Bar!
paragraphs.content: 4 handy buttons 4 better gaming experience! Now you can use Fullscreen to play games, Back to go back to homepage, Favorites and Download coming in November Update üìÖ!

paragraphs.title: NEW MACVG UPDATE SCHEDULE
paragraphs.content: MacVG will receive monthly updates on the first day of the month with new features üòé!

others: Fixed where the Tool Bar isn't showing or too small.
Fixed 7 games that weren't working.
Fixed Random Game Selector not working.
Removed 5 games for maintenance and crashing issues.

content.description: This update is relatively a smaller update for MacVG but there's some really big and useful features! The update is the first monthly update starting from v1.2 and we did a lot of changes, optimizations, organizations, and more to make MacVG a better and better game site everyday. We've come a long way but we still have a lot of other things to set. So let's see what new features and changes are here in the MacVG November Update!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Favorites!
paragraphs.content: Like a game a lot and play it a lot? No problem, just click on the star icon in the Tool Bar in each game, and the game will show up at the top of MacVG homepage for quicker access ‚≠ê!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Download!
paragraphs.content: Want to play a game whenever and wherever, even without the internet? Just click on the download button in the Tool Bar for each game and fill out the download request form to download the game üíª!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Bug Report!
paragraphs.content: There's often problems and bugs on each game, so now you can submit a bug report or a suggestion now right from the convenient Tool Bar ü™≤!

others: Fixed where the Tool Bar isn't showing or too small.
Fixed 7 games that weren't working.
Fixed Random Game Selector not working.
Removed 5 games for maintenance and crashing issues.

content.description: Wow, what a big update the December update is! With the 30 new games added, 7 new features, and more! It's very exciting to share them all with you! The most exciting part about the future of MacVG must be the Themes we're adding to the updates to come and the website will be more personalized and liked than ever! Thank you for checking out this update note and all the feature descriptions, and let's get right into it!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Panic Button!
paragraphs.content: You can now set a custom panic button or a combination which you would press when a teacher comes near, so you can quickly redirect to another site without them noticing that you were playing games! This works universally on the site. For more info, check here‚ö°!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Movable Tool Bar!
paragraphs.content: Sometimes the Tool Bar gets in the way of an important button for the game. That's why we made the Tool Bar movable so you can move the Tool Bar around to play the game without inconvenience, but also using the convenient Tool Bar features ‚úÖ!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Game Information!
paragraphs.content: Don't know how to play a game or want more detailed descriptions? No worries! Just click the "i" icon at the bottom of the tool bar for a popup window that tells you how to play the game and other related information! The report bug button is also moved into the window with a brand new modern design üì¢!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Share Game!
paragraphs.content: Want to spread the fun to your friends? No problemo! You can now press the share button on the Tool Bar to copy the game link and put it anywhere to share the game with others üì®!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Uncloak!
paragraphs.content: Now you can change the website back to its original beautiful MacVG favicon and title if you don't want to use the cloaking feature anymore ‚å®Ô∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW 30+ GAMES!
paragraphs.content: Check them all out in the New Tab and play the newest games added to MacVG üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW THEME: The Holidays!
paragraphs.content: A brand new feature is coming to MacVG - Themes! With awesome backgrounds, styles, and even customized logos, you can now enjoy playing unblocked games while enjoying different themes üéÑ!

others: Minor page layout, button, and tool bar visual appearance changes and updates.
Fixed Custom Cloaker not working, cloaker settings not working, and Favorites not working.
Removed 2 games for maintenance and crashing issues.

content.description: Happy New Year! New Year is the new beginning of everything. It's the start of an awesome year 2024, the beginning of a new change, and also, the new beginning of MacVG. Because it's the New Year, MacVG is now updated to version 2.0! A brand new and revamped version of MacVG is here with the massive January Update. From a brand new look for each game page, to new tabs, features, and more, this update is the most exiciting to share with you so far, so let's see what's new with the New Year!

paragraphs.title: NEW GAME PAGE LAYOUT
paragraphs.content: This is probably the biggest change on MacVG ever! Now, you will see a more information-rich game page when you select a game to play! You can enjoy the game however you want on the top left game player, and if you scroll down, you can see even more in-depth info about the game, similar games, and featured games! We removed the floating Tool Bar and changed it to a horizontal bar at the bottom of the game player with a bunch of useful new buttons, so it won't cover any content but also serves its purpose well! Other than that, there's still so much more to the new game page layout, so go check it out yourself üïπÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: New!
paragraphs.content: Don't want to miss any new games added to MacVG and you want to play them all? Don't worry! Just click on the New Tab on the navigational bar on the top, and you can see all the exiciting new games added in this update üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: Trending!
paragraphs.content: If you want to play the games everybody's playing, just click on the Trending Tab and see what games are the most played in the previous week so you can also join the trend! We sort the top 10 games by how many times the game was clicked in the past 7 days üî•!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: Chat!
paragraphs.content: Have fun enjoying a really good game but you only have it to yourself? That's what the new Chat Tab is for! You can now chat with people from around the world in real-time and share your gaming experience with others, or you can also just chat whatever you want üó£Ô∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: Groups!
paragraphs.content: WOW! How many new features and updates are in this update?! A TON! In the new Groups Tab, you can see collections of similar games or game series so you can play them all! We'll keep adding different groups for you to explore new games that you never knew about! Even more exciting, you will be able to create game groups yourself for better game orginization in the future üìÅ!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: MacBoard!
paragraphs.content: Because of the new Collapsible Catagories Menu and some other navigational changes, we added MacWeb's own soundboard MacBoard to the navigational bar so you can have fun playing the funny sounds directly from the MacBoard Tab, and we also added more sounds in this update, making it a 200-sound rich soundboard üîä!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Themes!
paragraphs.content: One more exciting feature is here with the 2.0 update, Themes! Now you can choose between dark and light themes for a personalized gaming experience! This feature made MacVG's accessibility better and everyone can use it however they want! While gaming and having fun is good, but having a customized website is even better, so because of that, we will continue to release new themes for more choices üñåÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW COLLAPSIBLE CATAGORIES MENU!
paragraphs.content: Because of so many new tabs and features, the navigational bar can't fit in so many tabs, so we grouped all the Catagory Tabs together into the collapsible menu on the top right corner of the screen. It saves a lot of space while also keeping the Catagory Tabs. Simpy hover over the Catagories Button and you will see a list of Catagories pop up, from there, you can choose your own catagory of games to play üé≤!

paragraphs.title: 8 NEW GAMES!
paragraphs.content: Only 8? We know what you're thinking. Yep, only 8 games are released in this update. We spent so much time working on the new game page layout, new tabs, new features, that we didn't have a lot of time to add more unblocked free games for you awesome players. But trust us, we're first focusing on the quality, features, and functionality of the website, and then we're gonna add a whole lot more games to the game library 8Ô∏è‚É£!

paragraphs.title: Renamed More Tab to Settings!
paragraphs.content: We moved the About section of the original More Tab to MacBlog, where you can access every app's related information and documentation. We also moved the Update Log section to MacBlog, so the old More Tab only has settings left, so we just renamed it to Settings for more clear naming ‚öôÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: What Does the Future of MacVG Hold?
paragraphs.content: As I said earlier, we're focusing on the quality, features, and functionality of MacVG first, and after all features are at their bests, we'll roll out more and more unblocked free games and become one of the best, biggest, and popular online gaming platforms in the world üåé!

others: New animation affects on search.
Added 10 new sounds to MacBoard.
Fixed Favorites not working, catagory navigational problems, and cloaker problems.
Minor visual appearance changes and updates.
Updated different catagories because of new games and removal of old games.

Removed 10 games for not working, maintainance, crashing issues, including Escaping the Prison, Shellshockers, Starve.io, Ballistic Chickens, Suviv, Zombs Royale, Jack Smith, Google Snake, Double Wires, and Chrome Dino. (Believe me, they're the only problemetic games that wasn't took care of for a really long time, so we finally got rid of them in the 2.0 update!)
Redid file organization and other file management for simpler and more clear code.
Removed the Portfolio link at the footer.

content.description: Hope you all's new year's going well so far. Following our past updates, we accidentally released an update with way more features, again. New tabs, new features, new looks, goodbye Chat... we can't list them all in one paragraph. So let's dig in and see what's new!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Recent Games!
paragraphs.content: Played a game on MacVG that's fun, but can't remember the name? No worries! From now on, all the games you've every played on MacVG are listed here, ordered by played date! Now you can access what you were previously playing in ease üïí!

paragraphs.title: NEW TAB: Originals!
paragraphs.content: This is one of the most exciting new features we're announcing in this update! The MacVG development team is starting to create our own original games for you to enjoy! Currently, there's only MacBoard available, with Cosmic Clicker coming in the March Update. Stay tuned for more awesome orignal games from us üïπÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW COLLAPSIBLE MENUS!
paragraphs.content: With the success of the release of the Catagories Menu last update, we're refreshing and adding new collapsible menus to the navigation bar! We gave the existing Catagories Menu a refreshed modern look, and we also added a new Help Menu for MacVG support, updates, documentation, about, and feedback! We're also rolling out the Help Menu on other MacWeb apps in the future, so you can have more support using our apps üíÅ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW SIDEBAR!
paragraphs.content: We just announced the release of MacWeb Site Material 2, and we're adding a sidebar to each MacVG page for easier navigation betweent all MacWeb apps! Simply move your mouse to the left edge of the screen, and a small sidebar will pop up, providing convenient navigation to other MacWeb apps in one click! To hide it, just click on any other place on the screen üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW LOGO! (kind of)
paragraphs.content: Following the release of MacWeb's Site Material 2, we're giving each of our apps, including MacVG, a new logo for the navigation bar and other uses. This makes the apps more distinct from each other, and it also gives the app a unique modern feel üñåÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: 25 NEW GAMES!
paragraphs.content: 25 new games are here at MacVG! Our main goal of recent updates is to make the game site into the most feature-rich game site ever, and we're very closed to reaching that goal. Because of that, we have more time to add new games to the site, so we added 25 new games for MacVG to have exactly 300 games! We'll bring more and more games and features to MacVG in the future updates, so stay put üÜï!

others: Removed the Chat Tab because of inappropriate uses and abuse.
New and more modern update announcement message.
Fixed outdated contents and improved optimization on each page.
Fixed MacBoard navigation problems and added 1 new sound.
Fixed bugs and flaws including page keeps scrolling down when pressing space bar and Favorites not showing games.
New animation effect when clicking on game tiles.
Minor visual appearance changes and updates.
Updated different catagories because of new games and organization.
Added the YouTube link at the footer.

content.description: This month, we focused on massively updating MacLearn and MacTime, without spending too much time working on MacVG, as it's already pretty good. One massive change is the new colors and a more sleek appearance throughout the whole user interface, other than that and some minor changes and bug fixes, there isn't anything too big. This update is more like a small maintainance update that enhances the site just a little bit. So let's see what's new with this update.

paragraphs.title: NEW APPEARANCE
paragraphs.content: This major change includes two reworks: primary color and general design. MacVG originally had dark blue for logo color, gold for accent color, random colors in random places, and neutral colors for background and elements. In this change, we unified the logo color and the accent color into this brand new vibrant orange color that guides you through the website. This makes your experience more unified, modern, and it's easier to distinguish between different MacWeb apps as they all got their own colors. Orange also asociates with excitement, fun, and vibrancy, which reflects what MacVG does: providing fun and exciting entertainment for you. We also changed element appearance including remade input fields that look more polished and more modern buttons. These design changes help with your experience and your eyes, making your game time at MacVG more comfortable üé®.

paragraphs.title: NEW THEME: Deep Dark!
paragraphs.content: We already had dark and light modes for you to choose from, but that's not enough. In this update, we're rolling out Deep Dark Mode that you can select from the Settings tab that makes everything pure black. This change helps a lot when it comes to eye comfort and low light environments. This also made MacVG a more accessible place for everyone to enjoy. Deep Dark also adds a unique touch that hopefully you'll like, enjoy üî•!

others: Fixed panic button and cloaker bugs and problems.
Fixed light mode problems and bugs and made it more polished.
Added new links and removed broken links from the navigational pane on the top right corner of game pages due to new pages and page removals.
Removed combination panic buttons because of inefficiency and bugs.
Removed some appearance bugs and animations.
Removed the back button from the tool bar because it's ... useless.

content.description: In this big update, we released a bunch of new features and fixed a lot of old ones to help make your gaming experience simpler and better, with a ton of new customization. With this update, MacVG is becoming more stable due to reworks and bug fixes and it's becoming one of the most feature-rich game sites out there! Let's see what we did and fixed:

paragraphs.title: DOWNLOAD REWORK
paragraphs.content: Let's be honest, the old Download was really bad. When you clicked on the button, it redirected you to a Google Form to fill out your download request, and 80% of the games don't work when you download them. This was very inefficient, slow, and annoying. That's why we completed removed the Download button on games that don't work when you download them, and for the 80 games that do work, when you click on the Download button, it's gonna download the game folder immediately, and you can simply unzip the folder and start playing the game offline, which makes downloading games much more efficient, faster, and we also don't need to process that many requests. Enjoy the new Download üìÅ!

paragraphs.title: SETTINGS REWORK
paragraphs.content: In this rework, we fixed almost every Settings option. First, we added an input field for the link of your desired tab favicon icon, so not only can you customize the tab's name, you can also customize the tab's icon, making it even harder for teachers to catch you. Second, we fixed the panic button settings, so that you can only enter one panic button instead of a combination, because of glitches and inefficiency. Third, we fixed the glitch where if you click on a setting, the page refreshes. Finally, we added the https:// prefix before the URL inputs, so it's easier for you to enter the URL in the Settings. We also fixed some other minor glitches and appearance issues on the Settings page ‚öôÔ∏è.

paragraphs.title: CUSTOM THEME!
paragraphs.content: This is one of the most exciting feature drops we've had on MacVG. You can now create your own themes to your likings! How cool is that? Not only can you enjoy your favorite games with your favorite colors, you can also customize MacVG! To create your own theme, go to the Settings tab, navigate to the themes section, click on custom, set your main color (background) and your accent color, then click on any other place on the page, and you can see your own theme! If you don't like it, simply click on the custom button again, and change your colors so it's the perfect theme for you (btw light mode for custom themes isn't yet supported, so we'll work on that). Don't worry, it saves everytime you modify it, so have fun building your custom theme üé®!

paragraphs.title: VISUAL ENHANCEMENTS
paragraphs.content: You may have already noticed the gradient glowing title on each page that changes colors. This creates a cool neon effect that matches with gaming perfectly. Hint: glowing title works best with Deep Dark or darker themes! We also tweaked the styles for the game page a little bit so it works well with all the different themes, including custom themes! Other than that, we released a new cyberpunk gaming theme and fixed some styling transitions, bugs, and issues. Also, there's a "New" icon next to new features so it's more recognizable and you can try the new feature out üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: About:blank Embedder!
paragraphs.content: This is a really awesome new feature in the Settings tab we're announcing in this update. There's a new section where you can type in the URL of the website that you want to open in an about:blank tab! So...why do you want to use it? Well, everything you do and every website you go to using the about:blank embedder will NOT show up in your browsing history! Now, you can game or do *other stuff* without it showing up in your history! The link also doesn't show up if you open the site in about:blank. If you want to game on MacVG without the teachers noticing, this is the way to go üî•! (Note that this isn't a proxy)

others: Added data analytics on each game page for data analytics.
Fixed broken links and features.
The update announcement banner is now only on the homepage.
Minor appearance updates.
Removed some appearance bugs and animations.
New descriptions and information on several games for more info-rich experience.
Updated tool bar appearance because of new features and Download Rework.

content.description: As the weather's becoming warmer and the summer break's coming closer, we released a bunch of new features, fixes, and most importantly, new games, to MacVG, as we haven't added any game for a pretty long time now. Hope you enjoy this update, and let's see what's new:

paragraphs.title: 12 NEW GAMES
paragraphs.content: After the big update we released almost 5 months ago, we haven't released any new game, so we're starting to add more and more new games on each update to keep your experience on MacVG fresh and exiciting. In this update, we added 12 new popular games that you'll enjoy playing. You can check out all the new games in the New tab of MacVG! We also updated the content on each tab because of new games and some minor adjustments üïπÔ∏è.

paragraphs.title: NEW LOOKS
paragraphs.content: Following the release of MacWeb site material 3, we added responsive designs and features to all our apps, including MacVG, because a lot of people have been complaining about website not working when using a phone, a smaller screen, or when zooming in. With this improvement, MacVG will automatically adjust its content to fit the screen size perfectly without not being able to use some features or links. This change made it easier for people to access the website and enjoy the same experience. We also updated the hover animation of games to match the site material üëç.

paragraphs.title: MACBOARD REWORK
paragraphs.content: We barely updated MacBoard since the release of it, which was more than half a year ago, and it had a lot of things that need to be updated and fixed. Other than changing the appearance of it, we also added a bunch of new features, like Repeat Sound, Download Sound, and Favorite Sound. These buttons will show when you hover over a sound. These features make it easy to have fun with the sounds while having maximum control over them! To stop repeating a sound, simply click on Stop All at the top of the page. We also improved the search functionality, random sound button, and other features. You can now play with the sounds with ways never seen before. On top of all that, we also added more than 20 new sounds from users' requests. Enjoy the new soundboard üó£Ô∏èüî•!

paragraphs.title: BUG FIXES
paragraphs.content: We fixed a lot of bugs caused by previous updates to keep your experience seamless and smooth. We patched the bug of Favorite and full screen not working on downloadable games, Download 2.0 not working, overflowing menu showing, custom theme not working on MacBoard, glowing not working on MacBoard, and fixed the bug caused by some styling issues. With these bugs patched, your gaming time on MacVG will be better than ever ü™≤!

others: Added Remove Favorites button to remove all Favorited games at once.
Delayed the release of Cosmic Clicker to August. (üôÅ)
The update announcement banner is now only on the homepage.
Minor appearance updates.
Removed some appearance bugs and animations.
New descriptions and information on several games.
Removed the Similar Games section on some games.
Removed 2 games, Monkey Mart and Run 3, due to very strange glitches and crashes.

content.description: Are you guys ready for summer break? Good news: it's only less than a month away! MacVG is also getting its own break with a bunch of bug fixes and stablization changes. After all the crazy updates, features, games, and reworks from the previous months, this update is more of a improvements update. We fixed a lof of bugs, issues, and glitched games, updated a lot of content, and improved our games' optimizations and performance with less lag and glitches. Here are the release notes for this update:

paragraphs.title: 10 NEW GAMES
paragraphs.content: We've been reading everyone's feedbacks and game requests, and almost everyone wants more new games. That's why we added 10 new fun games in this update that we hope you'll enjoy! Simply go the the New tab and check out the new games added in this update. Maybe you'll find your new favorite game there after playing them üïπÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Side Search!
paragraphs.content: In this update, we finally got rid of the weird games listed on the right side of each game page! They were problematic because they're pretty useless, there isn't a lot of games there, and they slowed down the loading time of the game. Instead, you'll see a new search bar on the right of each game page that lets you search any game on MacVG just like you would on the home page. This search bar makes navigating between games way easier and faster. To get from a game to another game, you no longer need to go back to the home page, search for the game, and click on it. Instead, you can just search up the game from the game page, and start playing instantly üîé!

paragraphs.title: CONTENT IMPROVEMENTS
paragraphs.content: With last month's appearance updates, there were some broken thumbnails and styling for the games, so we added some new thumbnails and styling improvements. We also updated the content in each catagory and added a new group in the Groups tab because of new games. We also added a bunch more game descriptions and information on several games. There are also a couple new additions on MacBoard. We reorganized and cleaned up some files. On top of all these changes, we also improved our code efficiency and enchanced our game optimizations, meaning there will be less lag now üî•!

paragraphs.title: BUG FIXES
paragraphs.content: To keep your gaming experience seamless and smooth, we fixed a bunch of bugs, old and new. We fixed the MacBoard navigation issue, fixed new animation not showing on some games when hovering, slight improvements on Custom Theme, fixed tiny styling issues, fixed update announcement covering the page title, and updated the site's styling. We also fixed the long lasted issues of not being able to play We Become What We Behold properly and Cut the Rope games not being displayed in the new game page UI, which means you can now favorite, share, report, and play Cut the Rope in full screen and see the related information on the games üêõ!

others: New slogan on the home page.
New scrollbar appearance.
Improved data analytics.
Minor appearance updates.
Minor bug patches.
Removed the Similar Games section on some games.
Added a new button in the about:blank section in Settings to open MacVG in about:blank quicker.

content.description: July is the month of summer! Most of you are probably already out of school in summer break, and you should be spending time with your family outside touching grass instead of being indoors playing unblocked games. Seriously, get off the game site. But anyways, we're still publishing our monthly updates, so here's what this relatively small stabilization update is about, from new games to bug fixes and more:

paragraphs.title: 30 NEW GAMES
paragraphs.content: This is the most games we've ever added in a single update since the initial release of MacVG with about 250 games more than a year ago. We spent a lot of time adding these new games, optimizing them, and putting them onto MacVG, so please go to the New Tab and check them out, maybe you'll find your favorite games there! From sports and idle games to adventure and reactions games, there's a ton of new fun waiting for you üî•!

paragraphs.title: CONTENT IMPROVEMENTS
paragraphs.content: Because of the new games added, we updated the content on many pages and updated some features because of this. We also reorganized MacVG's files into simple folders and cleaned-up, decluttered, merged, and optimized many execution and page files, along with updating some content and deleting unnecessary files, for a smoother, faster, and cleaner experience when using MacVG üßπ.

paragraphs.title: BUG FIXES
paragraphs.content: We fixed a lot of bugs in this update. From minor bugs to major bugs that made several games unplayable, they're all fixed in this update! The most important bug fix in this update is making it possible to type and interact in some games! A lot of you have mentioned this bug of not being able to type in many games, thus affecting game play, and we finally fixed it! A ton of the games are now playable because of this fix, so go check them out! We also fixed some bugs on the cloaker, Side Search, page content, layouts, and some other small appearance issues. Enjoy the bugless game site üõ†Ô∏è!

others: Made a lot of games playable by fixing a couple major bugs. (yay!)
Renamed a few games and updated some thumbnails.
Updated Shoology cloaker favicon.
Updated game description content.
Fixed announcement showing on the Originals Tab.
Fixed favicon not showing on game pages when using Chrome.
Fixed Side Search not working when there's no Recent games.
Fixed iframe game layout on some games.
Minor appearance updates.
Removed info.css and info implementations in all game.html files.
Removed MacVG User Survey.

content.description: August is the second month of summer break, and school is literally just a couple weeks away. As you prepare to go back to school, we're releasing a bunch of new games, features, and more on MacVG we hope you'll enjoy! Here's what's new in the August update:

paragraphs.title: NEW MACVG ORIGINAL: Atomic Survival!
paragraphs.content: We're very excited to announce that we've released a new MacVG original game (other than the soundboard MacBoard), called Atomic Survival! In this game, you need to gather atoms to generate energy in a world where matter is no longer stable. Then use the energy to unlock and buy different upgrades that boost your energy generation even more! Even better, energy still keeps generating while idle, so you can make progress by not even playing the game! We'll keep updating the game to add more upgrades, chellenges, and fun! Go to the Originals tab to check out Atomic Survival now ‚öõÔ∏è!

paragraphs.title: NEW FEATURE: Sort & Filter!
paragraphs.content: The whole point of game sites is to provide games for you to browse, play, and have a good time with to enjoy and relax. What's better to achieve this than being able to sort and filter all of MacVG's games to browse the games you like easily? With the new Sort & Filter feature right on the home page, you can choose a category you'd like to filter, and browse the games in the category you want! Or you can sort and organize the games in a certain way to view all of them with a different order. This feature adds even more freedom and ease to browsing and searching the large collections of games on MacVG, and we'll add more options in the future üîç!

paragraphs.title: 10 NEW GAMES!
paragraphs.content: In this relatively small update, we added 10 new interesting games from different categories and genres that we hope you'll like! Simply go to the New tab and check the newly optimized games out! Maybe you'll find your new favorite game there üéÆ!

paragraphs.title: SITE IMPROVEMENTS
paragraphs.content: In this update, we fixed a couple small bugs from the game iframe layout and the Side Search feature. We also updated some of the games' titles and thumbnails to keep them up to date, easier to browse, and relevant to the game. We also updated different tabs' and pages' content because of new game arrivals and to optimize for the new Sort & Filter feature. Enjoy the faster and cleaner MacVG üõ†Ô∏è!

others: New search bar placeholder.
New default game sorting order on the homepage.
Added total game count and category game count.
Fixed small iframe typing issues.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor appearance updates.

content.description: This update on MacVG is a fairly small adjustment update, as we only applied some slight improvements and fixed some bugs. We also removed some things, so let's see what we did:

paragraphs.title: 40+ NEW GAMES!
paragraphs.content: As we've already finished releasing all the major features we wanted to add to MacVG, we'll be adding a lot more games every update, starting from this update! We're introducing 41 brand new games across multiple genres, and maybe you'll be able to find your new favorite game here! Go to the New tab to check them out üéÆ!

paragraphs.title: NEW UPDATE SCHEDULE
paragraphs.content: Just like the new update schedule we're applying to other MacWeb apps, MacVG is also getting a new update schedule. From this update forward, MacVG is going to get an update every 3 months. This means we'll release a new update for MacVG each quarter of the year. Specifically, February, May, August, and November. Each update will be named after the season (Spring Update, Fall Update, etc). We made this change so the schedule is more consistent and regular, and we have more time to develop exciting new features üìÖ!

paragraphs.title: CONTENT IMPROVEMENTS
paragraphs.content: Since we applied a new redesign to MacVG recently, the navigation bar can't fit that many tabs, and we want to keep your experience on MacVG fresh and useful. That's why, with a heavy heart, we've decided to remove the Groups tab because it had no practical usage and no one used it/benefited from it. Other than that, we also removed a couple of bugged games that weren't playable at all. In addition to these, we also fixed some games for you to enjoy, fixed navigation links not working, fixed the Recent tab not showing any games, and updated the Originals tab with new content üî®.

others: Improved game thumbnails color contrast.
Improved navigation dropdown sensitivity.
Applied redesign styling to Sort & Filter buttons.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor appearance updates.

content.description: The third major version of MacVG is here with the MacVG 3.0 Winter Update, bringing a bunch of new games, massive improvements, and exciting new features to the platform! We've restructured the game system, made everything more dynamic, and added new ways to explore your favorite games. With better performance, a revamped interface, and a whole new genre tag page, MacVG is more fun and functional than ever before!

paragraphs.title: RESTRUCTURED MACVG!
paragraphs.content: As we kept adding more and more new games, MacVG became too large and we hadn't been able to deploy any new updates to MacVG for almost a full year, causing it to get outdated. This was a huge problem because we couldn't add new games, features, or fixes to MacVG. With the version 3.0 update, we've moved all the games and their files to separate repositories sorted by the games' categories. We've made 4 new repositories on GitHub: Action, Strategy, Driving, and Casual to host all the games. This effectivly cuts down the size of MacVG while still keeping all the games. This was the only way to deploy new updates to MacVG, so we're very sorry that this change reset all the progress on the games. This was the single biggest change to MacVG ever, so enjoy the new site üî•!

paragraphs.title: HUGELY OPTIMIZED GAME PAGE!
paragraphs.content: Just like the new update schedule we're applying to other MacWeb apps, MacVG is also getting a new update schedule. From this update forward, MacVG is going to get an update every 3 months. This means we'll release a new update for MacVG each quarter of the year. Specifically, February, May, August, and November. Each update will be named after the season (Spring Update, Fall Update, etc). We made this change so the schedule is more consistent and regular, and we have more time to develop exciting new features üìÖ!

paragraphs.title: NEW PAGE: Genre!
paragraphs.content: The whole point of MacVG is to make it easier to browse and explore different games. With the release of the new Genre page, you can view all the games in a genre to discover new similar games that are in the same genre! If you find a game's gameplay unique and interesting, you can click on the link on its genre, and you will see all the other games in the same genre and see a description of the genre! This also improves the organization and structure of MacVG. Easily discover new games based on your interests with the new Genre page üìÅ!

paragraphs.title: 50+ NEW GAMES!
paragraphs.content: Other than all these huge changes to MacVG, we also added more than 50 new games for more fun! You can view them all at the New Tab, and maybe you'll find your new favorite game! Feel free to try them out and play these new games üÜï!

paragraphs.title: ADVERTISEMENTS!
paragraphs.content: MacVG has come a long way. It really has, from June of 2023 to January of 2025, we've finally decided to put advertisements to the platform. We've worked on the site very hard almost everyday, spent hours adding new games and features, all for free. But with ad integration, our efforts can finally pay off. Ads help support us so we can continuosly roll out new features, ne games, and more. You will now see ads on almost every page on MacVG, but we promise they will never be intrusive or annoying. Please disable adblockers if you're using them on MacVG because this is the only MacVG can survive and keep adding new content for you guys. Thanks üíª.

paragraphs.title: QUALITY OF LIFE FEATURES!
paragraphs.content: We added a bunch of quality of life features to MacVG this update to make everything easier and faster. There's a new Clear Search button that appears on the search bar when you type something so you can search up a new game more easily. We also added Featured and Downloadable filters to the filter dropdown for you to browse new games! Other than these new features, there's also a new Sort Direction button next to the Sort & Filter dropdowns that sorts all the games by acsending or descending order. This makes looking up new games easier and saves you from scrolling to the bottom. With these quality of life changes, MacVG is now friendlier and easier to use than ever üå±!

paragraphs.title: CONTENT IMPROVEMENTS
paragraphs.content: We have content improvements every single MacVG update, but this one definitely has the most changes and improvements. To name a few, we hugely optimized the code, added new game descriptions and controls and made unfinished game descriptions and game controls invisible, search is now not laggy at all and results appear instantly, and deleted and organized a bunch of files to make the site faster. We're also transitioning from an unblocked game site for school to an actual game platform for the general audience. Because of this, we removed the panic button as it's buggy and not many people actually use it. We also updated the Settings tab and its description. Other than all these, we also fixed the Recents Tab so it actually works and shows all the games you've played recently. We also added a new Clear Recents option in case the page gets too cluttered up. We also removed some broken games and updated some games' thumbnails. With these updates, we hope to provide a better experience while using MacVG üìà!

others: New logo with new colors.
Recategorized some games to new genres.
Changed update announcement to a modal with new thumbnail.
Fixed Minecraft and a few other games not working.
Reordered game information bullet points.
Removed dedicated Originals tab and replaced by a dropdown.
Removed dedicated category pages.
Removed category link on game pages.
Removed game developer link on game frames.
Corrected spelling.
Bug fixes.
Appearance updates.

content.description: As MacVG's approaching its 2 year anniversary, the platform is becoming more complete. Over the years we've released countless new games, features, improvements, and fixes, and MacVG has finally reached the state we were hoping to achieve with the recent massive v.3.0 update. That's why MacVG updates from now on will be relatively small and will basically only include new game drops and bug fixes. In this update, we're mainly just adding a couple new games and fixing/improving some existing features and getting rid of some bugs. Let's see what we did this update:

paragraphs.title: 20 NEW GAMES
paragraphs.content: We added 20 new games to MacVG in this update, including some popular hit games like Run, Earn to Die, Gladihoppers, and Fortnite(?!) along with many other awesome fun games! You can check out all the new games in the New Tab and maybe you'll discover your next favorite game! Enjoy playing these new games on MacVG üÜï!

paragraphs.title: NEW FOOTER
paragraphs.content: We haven't updated MacVG's footer for almost 2 years, and it was a bit empty and outdated, so we decided to revamp the footer in this update. We put a new description along with Mail, YouTube, GitHub, and Discord links as icons on the bottom of the footer for easy access to our social links and get in contact with us. We also changed the layout and style slightly to look more visually appealing and functional. The copyright disclaimer year now also updates automatically so we don't have to manually change it every year.

others: Updated some games' description and controls.
Fixed the bug of clearn search button not disappearing after removing search query.
Fixed minor appearance bugs and problems.

content.description: As we bring out Christmas decorations, jackets, and some hot cocoa to get ready for winter, we're finally releasing the MacVG Fall Update on the first day of winter! We've been pretty busy with school, work, and other stuff lately so the fall update was delayed a bit from the planned November 1st release to December 1st. This is the first regular update after MacVG was completely rebuilt from scratch in the summer update. In this medium update, we added 10+ new games, added a gamer profile page, added quality of life updates, and more! Discover everything we did in this update below:

paragraphs.title: Me Tab
paragraphs.content: The main focus of this update is the brand new customizable Me tab that we added to MacVG. The Me tab is where your gamer profile is, and it lets you express yourself and show off to other gamers! Add a custom gamer tag, about me bio paragraph, and select a custom profile picture that represents you the best! Along with the gamer profile, we're also introducing streaks in this update, so keep logging on MacVG everyday, grow the streak, and earn that shiny badge displayed at the top of your profile! In the next winter update we're releasing in February, we'll add gaming achievements, favorite curated games and more on the profile page üéÆ!

paragraphs.title: New Games
paragraphs.content: We added relatively few games this update compared to previous updates because we were focusing more on the new Me tab and other features. However, we still managed to add more than 10 new games to MacVG in this update, including some popular hit games, so go check out all the new games in the New Tab and maybe you'll discover your next favorite game! Enjoy playing these new games on MacVG üÜï!

paragraphs.title: Quality of Life Changes
paragraphs.content: In this update, we made a lot of small but significant quality of life changes across MacVG to improve the overall user experience. We updated the overall styling so the different themes fit with dark/light modes better as well as the new pages, content, and elements. We changed how filtering options display the game count so everything works more smoothly, optimized, and accurately. On top of that, we also added lazy loading of all the games on the home page so only a small section of it renders at once so your poor potato school computer doesn't have to render every game's thumbnail at once, significantly boosting the performance and speed of the game site. We also optimized SEO and monetization to make MacVG more discoverable and make the community more engaged by introducing the brand new exciting Discord server. Join the new server now by clicking on the link on the footer üî•!

others: Released new Discord server for MacWeb!
Added banner ads.
Updated styling.
Fixed bugs.
